name: bosom
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a woman's breast or breasts: a large/ample bosom (= large breasts) The dress showed the top of my bosoms.
literary the front of a person's chest, especially when thought of as the centre of human feelings: A dark jealousy stirred in his bosom. My bosom swelled with pride.
More examplesFewer examplesThe dress left the bosom bare.She was slender, but with a voluptuous bosom.Her bosoms heaved as she breathed heavily.The bosoms of his parents were filled with pride.I rested my head on his manly bosom.
